By doing this, the brain becomes more stable and is able to operate optimally and efficiently. Neuroplasticity is your brain's ability to create new neural pathways. This puts you in the driver's seat of reclaiming and optimizing your health. Your brain is not hard-wired, it is not limited or fixed in it's abilities to heal.
